statement.p: Find the slope of the line that goes through the points (12,-9) and (7,-5).
Enter your answer as an integer or a reduced fraction in the form A/B

ul.li: \displaystyle\frac{{-{5}-{\left(-{9}\right)}}}{{{7}-{\left({12}\right)}}}=\frac{{4}}{{-{{5}}}} which reduces to \displaystyle-\frac{{4}}{{5}} (if it's not already reduced)
